Summary: balls of light and a large triangular object
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Edinburg
There were no other sightings in Edinburg on or around August 31st 2008
divs: sighting detailsthis happens almost every night! ive looked south from my apartment, from ground level and there are balls of light flashing around. they appear to be over the us\mexico border, maybe closer to us. even on nights where there is too much cloud cover to see stars or any other astrological phenomenon. tonight my girlfriend and i saw a huge, triangular object that appeared to be 200-300 yards across at the base. it seemed vaugely clear, with white lights at each tip. it was moving east at a very fast rate. we obverseved it for 10 seconds and then it dissapeared behind the clouds. we just happened to notice it while looking at the usual activity we are lucky to whitness every night. the balls of light that we see nightly have been occuring for years . ive lived on this street for five years and i would notice them while outside smoking a cigarette, and joke to my friends that i just saw a ufo. then as i began to pay attention, having seen them numerous times, i noticed that they were everywhere! they flash for 1-2 seconds and move at lightning speed. they move horizontally, vertically, diaganolly, every way possible. they manuver too quickly to be aircraft. or at least manned aircraft that we currently have flying. they make abrubt right angle turns at times at speed, which would kill any human in the technology we have available to the public. they go on from about 10pm until about 5am. with peak activity between 1 and 3am. ive seen them virtually every night i try to look for them and even gotten as many as 6 of my friends to watch at the same time. it is not an isolated incident, and i dont know why i never bothered reporting it, but tonights gigantic triangle accompaning the balls of light, i thought this was a notable story. i dont have a camera sensitive enough to capture images of them, and there is too much ambient light to video tape them so i cannot post images, but anyone wanting to contact me from mufon can feel free to do so.
